# Product images

## Create

Create new image from remote source:

`api/v3/products/%ID%/images.json`

```json
{
  "filename":"my_new_image.png",
  "src":"http://www.goldenplanet.dk/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/updated-automatically.png"
}
```

Create new image with base64 body:

`api/v3/products/%ID%/images.json`

```json
{
  "description": "image from base64",
  "is_default": true,
  "sorting": 42,
  "filename": "base64.gif",
  "attachment": ""
}
```
